title: Can i connect two bluetooth devices simultaneously
content:
I have a GMRS radio device called "Beartooth" that connects to the phone via Bluetooth.  It has an app that runs on the phone to allow text/PTT voice and location sharing to another Beartooth user.  

I would like to use it with a Bluetooth headset - at the same time - is this possible?  If so where are the instructions?  Thank you.
